评论详情: I wore them for a wedding and gotten a lot of compliments, however they are not the best for long term walking or standing, my feet were hurting after 2 hours, which is a bummer!

I'm beyond stoked! I normally wear an 11 but got the 10 because that's the biggest they went to and they fit and are comfortable. I'm beyond happy. I'm extremely giddy right now. Pure smile ear to ear The color is so pretty.
They feel like cardboard, are very small, insanely tight, and dig into the top of your foot.... Just don't do it. They feel like they will melt with the slightest bit of moisture

I don’t know how anyone is saying they can walk and dance in these for hours.  Maybe if you put a heel cushion in for the back of your heels/ankles.  There is no way otherwise.  Talk about blister city!  Cheap and poorly made.
For 50 dollars I got a damaged shoe as in Pic my wifes not happy and same here vary Disappointed.

评论概述: The shoes was true to size.
评论详情: Everything matched the shoes perfectly These was well worth the money

I wore them for a night out at the opera with my husband. These shoes were SUPER comfortable, allllll night! They were easy to walk in, and didn’t make my feet hurt at all. This was a win in my book, especially since I’m a tennis shoe/croc kind of lady. I will most definitely be purchasing these in black too.
Love these they’re very comfy and adorable

I ordered these in my normal size 7.5 but when they got here they were a little to big for me.  Although when I tried them on, boy oh boy were they comfortable.  I was pretty sad and wanted to exchange but they don't have the next size down.  My daughter however, now has some fabulous comfy shoes.  I'm definitely going to watch out for these to come in a different size, even color, they are beautiful.

评论概述: Seller never shipped shoes after 3 weeks
评论详情: Waited for three weeks for the seller to even SHIP the shoes and they never did.  What a scam because the shoes looked so cute!

If you're debating whether or not to buy these, do it! They're just as cute as pictured. Im an 8w/8.5 so I went with an 8.5. I probably should have bought the 8, as there is a little bit of room in the heel/toe. It's not enough to exchange but it's worth mentioning. I was concerned about the height because I don't wear heels often but they're super easy to walk in. I don't feel like a baby gazelle. I would recommend a cushion insert, though, to make them more comfortable if you plan on wearing them all day/night. Overall, I'm super happy with them!  **Update: I am going to return/exchange them for an 8.

I wasn't sure about ordering this pair of shoes. You never know what you are going to get when you order online. My order is the real size that I wear. They feel comfortable. They are extremely cute and look just like the pics.
Very beautiful good quality however I ordered a 9 and a half I guess I should've gotten a 8 and a half because these were falling off my daughter's heels
Very pretty lots of complements!!! Comfortable!!!
These shoes are beautiful and very comfortable! Not too high so they are easy to walk in! They stay on very well because of ribbon and are easy to put on and take off!

I'm thrilled with this new addition to my wardrobe. The intricate lace flower design adds a touch of elegance to the vintage and edgy vibe. The closed toe provides comfort, while the platform high heels give me the perfect boost in height. I wore these to a prom-themed event and received a ton of compliments. Not only did they match my costume flawlessly, but they also stood out as a unique piece. The quality is impressive, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the craftsmanship. This Gothic pumps fuse sweet and punk styles beautifully – a must-have for anyone seeking standout, chic footwear.

I'm always a little nervous to order shoes online. These shoes fit perfectly and they are honestly some of the most comfortable heels I have ever worn! I read that some people dealt with the ties loosening up and I didn't experience that! 10/10 would definitely recommend!

These shoes are uncomfortable. They are hard to lace up since the lace isn’t stretchy or even long enough for someone with a size 10 shoe. The quality of the shoe is impeccable. I just have a hard time wearing these and walking around without the lace shoe tie. I can run a different material through the shoe and wear them more comfortably but it doesn’t conform to my foot after being broken in. This is definitely for a gothic lolita or soft alt who needs a new pair for their photos.
Cutest shoes ever, and they are easy to walk in, great quality and actually comfortable.
If you’re second guessing buying these, don’t amazing! Love the fit and style and so comfortable! Buy again in a heart beat

First and foremost: These run very large. I would size down a 1/2 size at least. My feet flip and flop in these heels and I ordered my size. I couldn't give them a full five stars when the sizing was so off.  Second: These heels are so gorgeous! They are a little over the top for a typical date night per se, but for a special event, or a cosplay event they are an excellent choice!  If you size down, these should do great!
Sizes fit well.  The design is sexy and detailed.  Great shoe for the price.
The fit is perfect and they are very comfortable to walk in. Exactly as described and what I was looking for!

Omg I love them! They fit perfect so they are true to size. They are very sexy and comfortable to walk it. Shipped and packed nicely too. I love them so much I ordered the black pair. Get some different color ribbon and switch it out to match your outfit. Highly recommended item.

These lacy, chunky heels are really cute and fun. I ordered them for my teen who loves black clothes, chunky heels, and all things shoes. She loves these, though they do run a bit big. The opening at the top is wide, as well, so they are great for larger feet. The single ribbon that ties together is not attached to the shoe, but is laced through metal rives which hold it in place. The ribbon is long enough that it will work for even wide feet; my dauther's feet are one the narrower side, so she has to make sure she ties bigger bows so that she doesn't end up stepping on the ribbon overhang.  These are showy shoes that would be fun to wear with an otherwise very simple outfit, as they make their own statement.
These are my new favorite costume shoes1 They are made well, the lace and ribbon are attached very well. The strap is thick so it won't snap or break. They aren't slippery on the bottom either.

These are fun vintage look heels. Because the platform is so high, they’re actually really comfortable to walk in and wear. I didn’t have any issues with heel slippage. I think these for true to size, I’m normally a 6-6.5. They look just like the pictures, so no false advertisement there! I do think the lace will snag incredibly easily if you’re not careful, so watch for that. Might be a good idea to reinforce it somehow if you can? Otherwise, really nice shoe for what it is! I do think they’re a bit costumey, but I think they’re fun and would totally wear them as an everyday shoe. May not be everyone’s cup of tea though!
These are made with amazing attention to detail.  They are as comfortable as heels can be.  Delightful little shoes that look amazing on my feet.  Love them.
I cant wait to wear them on my birthday. Very sexy
The fit and the comfort was great
I am obsessed with these shoes! Super comfortable and fit true to size!

Omg I love these so much I wore them for an award assembly and then dinner and dancing afterwords I had them on for about seven hours and they never stopped being comfortable. The only downfall to these shoes is the ties loosen up so the shoe becomes loose. I did have to constantly keep tightening the bows Otherwise this is a magnificent shoe very

I was recently looking for some heels to go alongside an outfit I had bought. On my search, I came across these and found them to be quite cute. The noticably low amount of reviews had me skeptical but I wound up buying them. They just came in and are very nice. They look nice, feel nice, are quite easy to walk in, and add a good amount of height due to being platforms and having a good sized heels. Speaking of the heels, it doesn't feel low quality and is the perfectly thickness (In my opinion) for a heel but considering I got these just now, I will update this review in the future if anything comes up regarding them. In this photo, I haven't tied the ribbon into them just yet but even without it they still look quite cute. I decided to make this review to help anyone trying to make a decision on these that tend to turn away due to the low amount of reviews. I can say, these were a nice purchase.
They look amazing, they are so comfortable and easy to walk in.
